channel.title: News on East & World
channel.description: Recent content in News on East & World

item.title: Why the world is training on the book of Britain's most brutal prisoner
item.description: Charles Bronson (Photo: Joel Goodman/Global Look Press) Why the world is training on the book of Britain’s most brutal prisoner In the past 15 years, the fitness program of Briton Charles Bronson, who is serving a life sentence, has gained popularity. What is remarkable about the personality of the author, based on whose biography a film with Tom Hardy was made, and why the book written in prison has become a cult

item.title: What is important to know about exercising during pregnancy. Doctors' advice
item.description: Fitness for pregnant women in the pool (Photo: Al Bello/Getty Images) What is important to know about exercising during pregnancy. Doctors' advice Moderate loads, if the pregnancy proceeds without complications, you do not need to be afraid. But the frequency and intensity of training should be discussed with your doctor. Details - in the material below. Physical activity during pregnancy is necessary, at least if there are no contraindications.
